Name: Equinox Exorcism
Desc:
Stabs Dark and Light Swords by turns to hold baptism of the truth against enemies. Does not affect enemies in the Damage Reflection status.
Required Skill: Ender level 30 or higher

H.Old:
MP Cost: 2000. Activates Dark and Light Swords 13 times that attack enemies at 900% damage 7 times.
Additional Critical Rate +100% and Ignore DEF +100%
Cooldown: 45 sec.
When hitting Equalibrium Skills while in Equilibrium mode, decreases Equinox Exorcism's Cooldown by 3 sec.
Activating Equalibrium can reset Cooldown of Equinox Exorcism once.
H.New:
MP Cost: 2000. Activates Dark and Light Swords 13 times that attack at900% Damage 7 times.
Additional Critical Rate: 100%. Additional Ignore Monster DEF: 100%.
Cooldown: 45 sec.
During Equilibrium, hitting Equilibrium skills excluding Twilight Nova decreases Equinox Exorcism cooldown -3 sec.
Equilibrium resets Equinox Exorcism cooldown once upon activation.
